# The Modern Health Insurance Plan
The full-stack health platform customizing benefits to meet the needs of every employee.
I am a:
Select
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a61_select-icon.svg)
[Member](https://www.anglehealth.com/</members>)[Employer](https://www.anglehealth.com/</employers>)[Broker](https://www.anglehealth.com/</brokers>)[Provider](https://www.anglehealth.com/</providers>)

![User views for web and mobile of Angle](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/65f067ff355b0f7639ccd97f_mockup.webp)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/65a6d6014d7485062ccb9f39_apple-app-store.png)](https://www.anglehealth.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/angle-health-inc/id1572887423>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/65a6d636bca550bf60bd441b_google-play-store.png)](https://www.anglehealth.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anglehealth.inc&hl=en&gl=US>)
![Better health insurance has arrived!](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a54_Group.webp)
## A True Partner In Health Insurance
Angle Health is an AI-enabled health insurance plan that delivers comprehensive healthcare benefits. We offer employers more flexibility and options for their employees while removing the burdens of administration and access.
[Find Out How](https://www.anglehealth.com/</brokers>)
![Person](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a55_icon%20\(3\).svg)
### **Easy Procurement: Rapid Level Funded**
With Angle’s proprietary Quote to Card technology and Benefit Builder platform, gone are the days of member-level health applications and 7-10 day turnaround times. Swift level funded quotes, custom plan designs, and integrated point solutions are all dynamically underwritten with just a member-level census.
![Phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a56_icon%20\(2\).svg)
### **Modern Management: A Platform That Just Works**
Managing and accessing employer sponsored healthcare does not have to be hard. Angle integrates with 100+ payroll, HRIS, and benefit admin platforms, allowing us to meet employers where they are on their tools today. We help them interact with their health plan in a natural, uncomplicated manner.
![Person](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a55_icon%20\(3\).svg)
### **Elite Engagement: The Retail Approach**
With Angle’s integrated engagement programs, our team is enabling members' to access care beyond the plastic ID card, while taking a personal approach to engagement. We deliver personalized messaging based upon condition, plan, region and more with a focus on reducing barriers to entry and enabling members' ease of access to care.
![The Angle platfrom with icons for medication, brain, chat bubbles, report, hand offering a medical cross, & phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a58_Component%201\(3\).webp)
## **Better Insurance Requires A Better Infrastructure**
With a health plan rebuilt from the ground-up, Angle delivers a unified care platform connects millions of data points, hundreds of partner solutions, and next-level customization into a truly efficient benefit experience for both members and employers.
[Start Quoting](https://www.anglehealth.com/</brokers>)
![Display of facilities](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a2e/659d6c01f923fc3fc56e1a5a_Facilities_Providers.webp)

Angle Health is a healthcare technology company bringing quality, tech-enabled health insurance plans to the modern employer and their employees. Angle's employer sponsored health insurance plans in the state of Utah are offered by Angle Insurance Company of Utah. Angle, through its subsidiaries Angle Insurance Services and Adrem Administrators, offers employer sponsored health insurance solutions in Ohio, Indiana, Missouri, South Carolina, Arizona, Texas, Georgia, Florida, North Carolina, Nevada, Colorado, Tennessee, and Kentucky issued by Benchmark Insurance Company, an A rated carrier.

generated_description:
# Angle Health: Redefining Health Insurance for Startups

**Overview**  
Founded in 2019, Angle Health is a forward-thinking health insurance provider tailored specifically for startups. Located in the heart of San Francisco, the company emerged from Y Combinator’s W20 batch and is built on a mission to simplify and enhance health insurance.

**What They Do**  
Angle Health is not just another insurance plan; it's a full-stack health platform designed to customize benefits according to the diverse needs of employees. The company enables employers to offer more flexible options while alleviating the usual administrative headaches typically associated with health benefits. 

With innovative technologies like their proprietary Quote-to-Card system, Angle allows for rapid, member-level underwriting of health plans, significantly streamlining the procurement process. Meanwhile, their platform boasts integrations with over 100 payroll and HRIS systems, ensuring a seamless experience for employers from day one.

They focus on *member engagement* by providing tailored care access through personalized communications, enhancing the health experience beyond the traditional methods. This approach not only promotes ease of access but also improves the overall satisfaction of employees utilizing their health benefits.

**Key Features**  
- **AI-Enabled Planning**: Angle Health uses AI to create personalized healthcare solutions, making it easier to access tailored benefits.
- **Rapid Procurement**: Forget lengthy application processes; their technology allows for quick and efficient health plan creation.
- **Streamlined Management**: Integration capabilities make managing employer-sponsored healthcare straightforward and efficient.
- **Personalized Member Engagement**: Tailored messaging and engagement strategies that reduce barriers and enhance accessibility to care.

**The Team**  
Angle Health boasts a dedicated team of eight, led by co-founders Ty Wang and backed by industry heavyweights like Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator. Their combined expertise is focused on demolishing the old paradigms of the health insurance industry and building something that truly works for modern employers and their teams.

**Current Tagging**  
The company is tagged under categories like *health insurance* and *San Francisco Bay Area*, highlighting its niche and geographical focus.

**Recognition and Partnerships**  
The startup has already made waves in the industry, earning accolades for its innovative approach and securing funding partnerships with established entities. Angle Health is backed by notable investors and experts, which cements its standing as a leader poised to reshape health insurance.

For those interested in learning more or exploring their offerings, you can visit their website at [Angle Health](https://www.anglehealth.com).

In summary, Angle Health is setting a new standard in the health insurance arena for startups, combining sophisticated technology with personalized care, all while making the process smoother and more engaging for everyone involved.
